stories.text:
Im trying to find out how you folks are investing your money. Do you guys stick with fundamentals or are you guys looking at security analysis ?

Do you guys are worried about inflation? im not really sure where i can read about both sides of yhe table. How did you guys dealt with bear markets / bull markets? how did you guys know youre in one or youre in about to approach one?

What reading materials you guys have to keep up to date and get informed about current status quo of the markets as well as the future state

I’m getting a lot of noise and I find it hard to make good judgements nowadays.
stories.title: Ask HN: What options do we have to invest money on for the current status quo
